Paragraph.Text: Chargable bomb with increased radius depending on charge level. This explosive can be charged using an adjacent Power Storage Block, Power Generator or via a Laser Energy Transmitter. It will maintain its charge while it is carried to an alternative location at which point it can be detonated using the alternate interact key (default 'Shift+E').
Every time the power stored multiplies by 10, the charge level will increase by 1!
- This machine needs increasing amounts of power!
- Intermediate levels of energy give no extra blast radius!
- Reaching level 6 with the current energy production implemented will already be a challenge!
Has a very shot fuse! Blowing up your base by accident is a thing!
